name: Guild Wars 2 World Event Tracker
short_description:
*NOTE*
Since ArenaNet has disabled the Guild Wars 2 API, this project will no longer function.

"Guild Wars 2 World Event Tracker" is a 2-stage alert/notification system for the events that reward daily chests in Guild Wars 2.

It will show a notification when the pre-event starts and another when the event that rewards the chest starts. You can tick the events once you've done them and if the "Track Completed Events" is disabled, it won't alert you to the events you have ticked. The checkboxes will automatically reset at 00:00 UTC to coincide with the server resets.

Installation/Update:
- Uninstall any previous version
- Extract and run the setup.exe

Requires:
- GW2 to be run in Windowed/Windowed Fullscreen
- .NET Framework 4.5 (Windows Vista/7/8)

Features:
- Active event and pre-event alerts
- Disable tracking on completed event
- Automatic reset
- Alert log
- Sound alert
summary: Tracker for all the bonus chest events in Guild Wars 2
